DOC.brief_title: Discontinuation Dasatinib Patients With Chronic Myeloid Leukemia-CP Who Have Maintained Complete Molecular Remission Two Years ; Dasatinib Stop Trial
DOC.criteria: Chronic Myeloid Leukemia Chronic Phase . Patients BCRABLnegative check . 15 year old . ECOG performance status ( PS ) score 02 . Adequate organ function ( hepatic , renal lung ) . Signed write informed consent . A case double cancer activity . Women pregnant breastfeeding . Patients complication history severe . Patients mutation T315I、F317L、V299L . Patients additional chromosome abnormality . The case Pleural effusion poor control . Patients history hematopoietic stem cell transplantation .
